trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_000<tab>I took in a performance at the Mujikoza the other day and must say, it was quite an experience. I, of course, had no idea what was going on, but it all <var 1A 02 /var>sounded<var 1A 01 /var> brilliant.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_001<tab>The local courtesan who accompanied me explained it was a tale of thirteen samurai─ronin, I believe she called them─who embark on a journey to avenge their slain lord.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_002<tab>All in all, 'twas a bloody affair that ended in the death of everyone save the tiny fellow in charge of the lightning...but the audience were on their feet cheering for more.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_003<tab>Principal Jenomis claims that the rifts 'twixt any two cultures can be bridged through the telling of tales. Though, I worry that anyone who would cheer an ignoble death in the service of one already dead will be unable to appreciate aught we might offer them here on the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_004<tab>Oh, and I said that aloud, didn't I? How careless of me!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_050<tab>You spoke with a Viera, you say? How exotic! I recall reading that following the Empire's occupation of Dalmasca, several imperial army units were sent into the jungles to round up the hares and bring them to Rabanastre.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_051<tab>As you might imagine, only a few of the soldiers returned...and the few Viera with them appeared to have followed on their own volition.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_052<tab>Those Viera who have taken up residence in the cities tend to be held in high regard, their small numbers lending to their air of mystery. It is not unheard of for members of the upper class to part with great deals of their wealth simply to be seen with one of the elusive ladies.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_053<tab>You should consider yourself lucky to have made this Fran's acquaintance, my friend. Perhaps with a nudge or two, she might consider joining our troupe?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_054<tab>Leader of the resistance, you say? Pah! She'll have time for that between rehearsals.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_080<tab>Would you mind telling me what that was, and what it did to poor Alma!?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_081<tab>Nothing to worry about? Nothing to worry about!? Ahem... Yes. Did I appear worried, because I am anything but. Worried, that is. And I am not. Ahem.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_090<tab>You have returned with Alma! What a reli─ Wait...is there someone missing?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_100<tab>If anyone can rescue our Ramza from this peril, it is you...and I mean that. Literally. Look around. Not one of us here is a fighter. You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> our only hope.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_110<tab>You've done it again! Not that there was any doubt! Oh, there were those who doubted you. I shan't name names, but I was not amongst them! I always knew you to be a beast. A lion. A beastly lion!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_120<tab>"You, no less human than we? Ha! Now there's a beastly thought. You've been less than we from the moment your baseborn father fell upon your mother in whatever gutter saw you sired!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_121<tab>"You've been chattel since you came into the world drenched in common blood!“

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_122<tab>A terrible line, isn't it. Oh, the writing is fine. Jenomis is a master at his craft. It's just... Why did <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> have to be picked for the role of Argath? He's such a...such a...bloody bastard! Unlike myself...of course.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_000<tab>My thoughts drift often to my brothers in Garlemald.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_001<tab>I fear they think I have somehow abandoned them...
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_050<tab>Oh, dearest brothers, will you forgive me...?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_051<tab>Hm? Come to gloat over this accord with the Dalmascan resistance? They are traitors, and allying ourselves with such rabble would be tantamount to treason!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_052<tab>Not that you would care. Your mission has ever been to see my people underfoot. Leave me be.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_080<tab>That...That was all the auracite's doing? Such power...

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_090<tab>It has been made obvious that the auracite is beyond our control─beyond <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> control, even. Its power must be contained, researched, and managed...and there is only one who might accomplish such a task...

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_100<tab>Ramza exhibits talent as both an actor and a playwright, yet he lacked the sense to realize that aligning himself with a foreign barbarian would end in naught but failure. If only he had petitioned the Emperor...
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_000<tab>At first, we thought Alma was merely a tad under the weather. The winds up here can prove quite chilly. But now...
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_050<tab>Of course I've heard of the Viera! Where did you think I got the ideas for half the company's wardrobe?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_080<tab>K-K-Keep away! I'm not about to be whisked away into the void by some strange portal you've gone and dragged onto the ship! Shoo!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_090<tab>I see Alma is back...and none the worse for wear; but now Ramza has gone missing? When will this all end, I ask? When?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_100<tab>I assume you will be soon dealing with this mess─dealing it a jab to the gut and then a swift kick to the crotch.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_110<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What was it like? Did the angel scream when you clipped her wings?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_111<tab>Oh, I apologize. I seem to have allowed myself to get caught up in all the excitement. I actually abhor violence. 'Tis why I joined the Majestic instead of taking up steel for the imperial army.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_112<tab>Well that, and because I fell in love with Ramza the first time I laid eyes on him. I mean, fell in love with his magnificent performance, of course. What did you think I meant? Is it hot in here?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_120<tab>"What flaw do you hold there to be in us? That we were born between a different set of walls?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_121<tab>"Do you know what it means to hunger? To sup for months on naught but broth of bean?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_122<tab>"Why must we be made to starve that you might grow fat? You call us thieves, but it is you who steal from us the right to live!“
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PRETTYMEMBER_000_123<tab>You did not think me merely the company's outfitter, did you? I would also wager you did not know I make a wicked broth of bean.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_000<tab>My friend! Why the hurry? There is little in this world more important than a chest of steel...unless it is calves of granite!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_001<tab>Would you care to join me for a few thousand lunges? Your body will thank you in the morning! As will your lover, ah hah hah hah!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_050<tab>Where is this Viera of whom you speak? Not much in the way of meat on their bones...yet nor is there a surfeit of unnecessary flesh.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_051<tab>Their arms...their thighs...their hips... They are one and all finely sculpted goddesses, not unlike those the mages of Amdapor once carved from Abalathia's bounty...for there is magic in their limbs─magic to set my very loins aflame!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_080<tab>Never before have I stood in the presence of such power. The whole experience had my muscles a-tingle! Yet I am not afraid, for it is with might that we can stand against magicks so foul!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_090<tab>More thew than a dzo in rut, yet powerless to save Ramza from a fate worse than prop building. If my muscles cannot prevent such misfortune, then, pray, what are they good for...?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_100<tab>I am decided! I shall accompany you on your journey to rescue Ramza and see these muscles put to good─ Your fellowship is in no dire need of another hand, you say? Of course... I shall be here training should you need me, then!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_110<tab>I see you handled matters on your own─not that I believed you couldn't. With the amount of time that you obviously devote to your training, victory was all but guaranteed. Ah hah hah hah.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_120<tab>"A man does not eat an omelette without breaking eggs! Blood is the price of progress! It is the ink in which history's pages are writ!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_121<tab>"Look around you, boy! Ivalice rots from within! Your brother would carve out the root of its decay, even if it means his hands must needs be soiled!“
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_122<tab>Ah, never a truer passage was spoken...though I prefer to take my eggs raw. Builds character, they say. Or at least I say.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_000<tab>I did it, friend! I took our principal's words to heart and spent a moon traveling the islands of the Ruby Sea.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_001<tab>I eventually ended up on Onokoro where I was taken in by a merry band of Confederates. What characters they all were!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_002<tab>We feasted and drank until morning, singing the songs of our people.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_003<tab>When the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> first arrived in Kugane, I told myself I would not let my grief overcome me. I put my head down and concentrated on my craft. It was not until much later that I realized that by paying that grief no heed, I had allowed it to swell like a stormhead in winter.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_004<tab>But now, I've found I can be happy once again. Or at least try to be.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_050<tab>While the Empire provides the peoples she conquers with a path to citizenship, there is a definite disparity when compared to the opportunities granted trueblood Garleans.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_051<tab>It is sad, but there are many who believe it natural for a conquering race to claim itself superior to another. However, not all Garleans are as foolish, and many would work to see this disparity narrowed─Garleans like Principal Jenomis.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_052<tab>Still, for those living in the occupied provinces, the prospect of life as a second-, or even third-class citizen is more than enough cause to kindle the flames of revolution in even the meekest of hearts...and it is these flames that ultimately feed the fires of change.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_053<tab>This all must be especially difficult for the Viera. Despite their differences in culture and appearance, they had long been accepted by the Dalmascans─treated as equals. Now...

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_054<tab>Though we have forsaken our homes, it does not change the fact that many on the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> claim Garlean heritage. Given her recent hardships, Lady Fran has every right to be wary of us. I will allow her the time she needs to come to her own conclusions as to our intentions.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_080<tab>I was secretly hoping you'd regale me with tales of the Viera and their tribes' strange ways...but I fear now is not the proper time. Perhaps another day...when the principal's daughter is safe.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_090<tab>When I was but a pup, I lived on the streets of Garlemald...or to be more precise, <var 1A 02 /var>beneath<var 1A 01 /var> the streets. My home was the sewers, and my family the countless other orphans who kept to the shadows lest they be carted off to the ceruleum mines...or worse.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_091<tab>At least they <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> my home until the senate voted to seal them off. When the purge came, my brothers and I were given no choice but to flee, and so we ran and we ran...until there was nowhere left to run.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_092<tab>Fortunately, a handful of influential families had taken pity on our plight, and demanded that the Empire see to the care of these displaced children, for what is a nation's future, if not their children? Or so they argued.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_093<tab>The senate conceded and proposed a system that would provide aid for families that adopted these “sewerlings.” It was the Lexentale family that took me in, and for many summers did I work as an errand boy for their troupe while going to school and learning to play the lute.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_094<tab>I suppose you could say that makes Ramza and I brothers...which is why I cannot bear to think of what I would do if he were not to return. I beg of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Save him.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_110<tab>You have saved Ramza! You have saved my brother! If there is anything I can do to repay you, name it, and it is yours!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_120<tab>Lady Fran has agreed to introduce me to a storyteller from her former village that I may learn of her people's history.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_121<tab>Would that this meeting inspire me to pen my next great symphony! Or at least a merry jig to use in <var 1A 02 /var>The Zodiac Brave Story<var 1A 01 /var>'s newest act!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_000<tab>One, two, three! One, two, three! I must stay ever limber for─
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_001<tab>Er... Why, for the stage, of course. Who...I mean, <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> did you think I meant?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_050<tab>What ever is he waiting for? A signed invitation to my chambers? Pah! Unless... Perhaps I <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var> send him a signed invitation... No, he would think me too forward! Or would he...?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_051<tab>Eavesdropping on a maiden's private musings! How graceless of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_080<tab>Nothing will become of Alma, will it? I cannot imagine the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> without her!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_090<tab>Oh, Ramza... His selfless act has now put his own life in danger. Has a brother never loved his sister more?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_100<tab>You will find Ramza safe. I know it. May your gods be with you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_110<tab>You're back! And with Ramza! Oh, I worried for you so! For both of you!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_120<tab>Ah, allow me to introduce the Majestic's newest member. This young man is from the Mujikoza and has come to study under me─ Under us. Under our guidance. Yes.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_YOUNGMANOFLOVE_000_121<tab>It is an honor, milady. Thank you for this...opportunity.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_DANCINGMEMBER_000_122<tab>What? I know not what you're implying, but this relationship is purely professional. Purely! And this is merely rouge on my cheeks. Nothing more!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_000<tab>Before Cid left─again─he handed me another of his queer contraptions. Mumbled something about it being a modified version of the Allagan storage node. Would you care to take a listen?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_050<tab>Master Jenomis can be quite long-winded, especially when the topic turns to Ivalician legend. I oft find myself dozing off somewhere after the first few invocations of the phrase “According to the Durai Papers...” Fortunately, these Allagan nodes allow us to pretend we never took that nap.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_080<tab>What was that!? I've listened to all the node entries thrice and not once does the principal speak of magicks such as those we witnessed!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_090<tab>And just when the boy had begun to return to his normal, caring self... Oh, Ramza. I do hope you are unhurt!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_091<tab>When we were in Garlemald, the young Lexentale never spoke ill of others─and most certainly not of his sister. It wasn't until arriving in Kugane that his temperament began to change...and not for the better.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_092<tab>He began lashing out at anyone and anything that was different. His life in the Empire had not prepared him for what awaited on the outside, and the exile left him stripped of an identity in which he still held much pride.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_093<tab>He allowed his frustration to consume him, but such is to be expected from someone so young.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_094<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>. I ask you to look past Ramza's transgressions, for they are but a product of his youth. He is a good child, and does not deserve the fate he has been dealt. Please, you must find him.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_110<tab>I knew you could do it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We all did.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_120<tab>With the new final act comes several new roles─roles we do not have the means to handle. You don't think you would be interested in a─ Ah, but I jest!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_130<tab>With the new final act comes several new roles─roles we do not have the means to handle.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_131<tab>I considered asking Mikoto, Fran, and Bwagi to lend their talents...even if temporarily, but all three declined. Mikoto has elected to forestall her return to Sharlayan that she might expand her research in the field. Fran and Bwagi supposedly have a resistance to lead.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS3V45_00542_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_132<tab>Wait. You don't think <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> would be interested in a─ I jest! I jest!
